verbs.description: On the National Day of Prayer , and in the midst of [ARG2: new revelations] [V: involving] [ARG1: porn star Stormy Daniels] , Trump announced a new faith - based initiative aimed at policing any federal - agency actions that disturb his conservative Evangelical base .
